Template tags¶

bambu_comments.templatetags.comments.contenttype(value)¶

This returns the content type ID for a given object

bambu_comments.templatetags.comments.gravatar(value, size=60)¶

This takes an email address and returns a Gravatar image of a given size :param value: The email address :param size: The width and height of the square Gravatar image
